detail_desc: Long-sleeved blouse in an airy weave with a unique nursing feature and a V-neck at the back with ties at the back of the neck. The design includes a double layer at the top to help retain warmth while allowing easier nursing access.
Fully lined, non-wired bikini top with adjustable shoulder straps, removable inserts that shape the bust and provide good support, lacing at the front and a frill trim at the hem. No fasteners.
Hat knitted in soft cashmere with a roll edge.
Fully lined, 5-pocket, slim-fit jeans in washed, stretch denim with hard-worn details. Adjustable, elasticated waist, a zip fly and narrow hems.
Sleeveless blouse in linen with a deep V-neck front and back, buttons down the front and a seam at the waist with a flared peplum.
TOCA LIFE x H&M. Long-sleeved top in soft sweatshirt fabric with a motif, jersey-lined hood and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Chelsea boots in nubuck leather with elastic gores in the sides and a loop at the back. Canvas linings and leather insoles. Heel 4 cm.
Ankle-length cigarette trousers in a stretch weave with a regular waist, concealed zip in one side, fake back pockets and tapered legs with slits at the hems.
Slim-fit jeans in washed superstretch denim with hard-worn details, an adjustable elasticated waist (in sizes 8-12Y) and zip fly and press-stud. Fake front pockets, real back pockets and narrow hems.
Shorts in washed cotton twill with an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and button, side pockets and a fake welt back pocket.
Boxer shorts in cotton jersey with short legs, an elasticated waist and lined front.
Lined, non-wired triangle bikini top with a small metal ring at the front. Adjustable shoulder straps, cups with removable inserts that shape the bust and provide good support, and ties at the back.
Wide yoga top in fast-drying functional fabric with short cap sleeves and a back partially in mesh. Opening with ties at the back.
Treggings in soft corduroy. Skinny fit with an adjustable, elasticated waist, fake fly, fake front pockets and real back pockets.
Double-layered tulle skirt with an elasticated waist and sequined embroidery. Unlined.
Large make-up bag with a zip at the top. Lined. Size 18x25 cm.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with sewn-in turn-ups on the sleeves.
Lace bikini briefs with a low waist, lined gusset, mesh ties at the sides and medium coverage at the back.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a high waist and wide covered elastic straps at the sides.

Calf-length dress in a patterned weave with a frill-trimmed neckline that has a V-shaped opening with ties and a button at the top. Long sleeves with a frill trim that continues over the shoulders, an elasticated seam with a flounce and decorative drawstring at the waist, and an asymmetric hem. Unlined.
Straight-cut top in ribbed jersey with a V-neck. Relaxed fit with dropped shoulders, short sleeves and slits in the sides.

Set with a bow tie and lapel pin. Pre-tied bow tie in a jacquard weave with an adjustable strap and fastener at the back. Metal lapel pin with a decorative flower in woven fabric. Width of bow tie 11 cm. Length of pin 7 cm.
Shorts in cotton twill. High, frill-trimmed paper bag waist with elastication, and a zip fly with buttons. Side pockets and wide legs with sewn-in turn-ups.
Oversized jumper in a soft knit containing some wool with a ribbed polo neck, low dropped shoulders and long sleeves. Straight hem with slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.

LOVE STORIES x H&M. Soft, non-wired bra in lace with mesh-lined cups with removable inserts that give the bust a natural shape and provide light support. Narrow adjustable shoulder straps, elastic at the hem and fastener at the front.

Romper suit in a cotton weave with frills at the top and narrow shoulder straps that are elasticated at the back. Elastication at the top of the back and hems, and press-studs at the crotch and down the inside of the legs (no press-studs in sizes 1-4Y).
A pair of earrings in a three-part hoop design made from steel and recycled zinc.
5-pocket trousers in washed superstretch twill with a regular waist and slim legs.
Soft suede boots with a slightly wider shaft and pointed toes. Fabric linings and insoles and rubber soles. Cone-shaped covered heels 9.5 cm.

Calf-length dress in softly draping satin with a concealed zip at the back and a wrapover V-neck at the front with a concealed hook-and-eye fastener. Long raglan sleeves and wide cuffs with covered buttons. Seam at the waist and a skirt with pleats at the top to create soft draping. Unlined.
Jacket in soft, fluffy faux fur with notch lapels, a concealed press-stud fastening at the front and patch front pockets. Lined.
Ankle boots in imitation leather with elastic gores in the sides and a loop at the back. Fabric linings and insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles. Heel approx. 4 cm.
Calf-length kaftan dress in soft cotton jersey with a V-neck, cap sleeves and slits in the sides. Unlined.
Hipster briefs in microfibre and lace with a mid waist, lined gusset, wide sides and cutaway coverage at the back.
Short shorts in light sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist and side pockets.
Calf-length skirt in softly draping viscose satin with a sheen. High waist with concealed elastication and a gentle flare to the hem. Unlined.
Leggings in soft cotton jersey with an elasticated waist and print motif.
Sleeveless, knee-length dress in a viscose crêpe weave with narrow, tie-top shoulder straps, elastication around the top and a smocked seam at the waist.
5-pocket jeans in washed stretch denim with hard-worn details, a regular waist, zip fly and slim legs with sewn-in turn-ups.
Metal earrings in the shape of a face. Length 5 cm.
Pre-tied bow tie in velvet made from a silk and viscose blend with an adjustable strap and fastener at the back. Width 12 cm.

Shirt in an airy viscose weave with a turn-down collar and French front. Long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, a yoke at the back and a rounded hem. Slim fit with narrow shoulders and a tapered waist for a fitted silhouette.
Shorts in soft jersey made from a modal and cotton blend. High waist with covered elastication, and diagonal side pockets.
5-pocket skirt in washed denim with a high waist, button fly and frayed, raw-edge hem.
Long-sleeved top in soft sweatshirt fabric with an interactive motif, and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Short-sleeved sports tops in fast-drying functional fabric.

Straight-cut blouse in a woven wool blend with a small opening and buttons at the back of the neck, a yoke and flap chest pockets. Wide sleeves, one with a flap pocket, and wide, close-fitting cuffs with a button. Short slits in the sides.
Headband knitted in a soft mohair and wool blend with a wrapover detail at the front.

prod_name: D1 PE - AURORA THIN KNIT SCARF
detail_desc: Scarf in an airy wool weave containing some cashmere with raw edges.

Padded parka in woven fabric with imitation leather details. Detachable, faux shearling-lined hood with a faux fur trim and a high stand-up collar. Zip down the front with a chin guard and wind flap with toggle fasteners. Flap front pockets with a button, handwarmer pockets with press-studs, a zipped pocket on one sleeve and inner ribbing at the cuffs. Lined.
Treggings in soft, stretch cotton twill with an elasticated waist, fake fly and button, fake front pockets and real back pockets.
Top in soft jersey made from a cotton blend with a round neckline and long sleeves.
Pleated, calf-length skirt in a crêpe weave with covered elastication at the waist and a button band with decorative buttons down the front. Gently flared with an overlocked hem. Unlined.

Calf-length dungaree dress in washed cotton denim with a V-neck and adjustable shoulder straps. Wrapover front with diagonal buttons down the front and concealed buttons. Detachable belt with a metal buckle at the waist, side pockets and a slit at the front of the hem.
Briefs in soft cotton jersey with wide, visible elastic at the waist and a lined gusset.
5-pocket joggers in washed stretch denim with an elasticated drawstring waist, fake fly, shaping seams at the knees and ribbed hems.

Jumpsuit in a crêpe weave with a wrapover front and an opening with a covered button at the back of the neck. Long puff sleeves, an elasticated seam and detachable tie belt at the waist, side pockets and tapered legs.
Pyjamas in printed cotton jersey. T-shirt top with a round neckline. Shorts with an elasticated waist.
Lined, non-wired triangle bikini top with ties at the back and back of the neck and cups that give the bust a natural shape and light support.
Shorts in a cotton weave with an elasticated, drawstring waist, fake fly and fake front pockets.
T-shirt in soft, printed slub-cotton jersey with a ribbed neckline.
Three-strand neckline of thin metal chains decorated with small plastic beads and round pendants. Adjustable length, 45-53 cm.

Long-sleeved dress in glittery-patterned tulle with a small frilled collar and a small opening with a button at the back of the neck. Elasticated cuffs with a flounce, a seam at the hips and a flared skirt. Jersey lining.
Socks in a soft, fine-knit cotton blend with elasticated tops.
Fully-fashioned trainers in mesh with a decorative knot detail at the front and a loop at the back. Mesh insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles.

Calf-length dress in a soft viscose weave with a small frilled collar and V-neck opening at the front with narrow ties at the top. Seam with narrow, concealed elastication under the bust and long sleeves with frill-trimmed smocking at the cuffs. Unlined.
Fully lined trousers in narrow-wale cotton corduroy with adjustable elastication and a drawstring at the waist and a fake fly with decorative buttons.
Sleeveless dress in ribbed cotton jersey with a glittery elastic waistband and skirt in several layers of tulle. Jersey underskirt.
Skirt in tulle with glitter. Elastic waistband with a bow, seam with a small frill trim and a flounced tier to the hem. Lined.
Fully lined swimsuit with a V-neck, narrow adjustable shoulder straps, low-cut back and high-cut legs.
Top in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with long raglan sleeves and a wrapover, jersey-lined funnel collar with a drawstring. Kangaroo pocket, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
5-pocket jeans in stretch denim with a regular waist, zip fly and button, and skinny legs.
Shorts in sweatshirt fabric with side stripes, an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and a back pocket. Soft brushed inside.
Joggers in lightweight jersey made from a cotton blend with a ribbed, elasticated waistband, pockets in the side seams and ribbed hems. The cotton content of the joggers is organic.
T-shirt in soft jersey with an interactive motif on the front.

Jumper in a soft knit containing some wool. Relaxed fit with dropped shoulders, long sleeves, ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem, and short slits in the sides. The polyester content of the jumper is recycled.

Short, A-line dress in a woven fabric with a round neckline and an opening with a button at the back of the neck. Short, flounce-trimmed sleeves and laser-cut, hole-patterned scalloped edges around the sleeves and hem. Unlined.
T-shirt in soft jersey with a reversible sequin motif on the front and narrow ribbing around the neckline.
Long top in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with a lined, drawstring hood and kangaroo pocket. Low dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Court shoes with pointed toes and covered heels. Satin linings and imitation leather insoles. Heel 6 cm.
